* You are in Tanzania? Remember to join us! If you wish to contribute to the advancement of the Tanzanian team of Ubuntu users, is simple!

Join our growing mailing list, if you have not already! We'd love to hear what you have to say, your ideas, proposals, suggestions, how do you think that Ubuntu Linux can be better supported and promulgated in Tanzania?

Watch for yourself our mailing list: Ubuntu-Tanzania members.

(Communication in the list in three languages: Arabic, Kiswahili and English).
